title: Status Effects
content: ad. Enhance Ability Target gains Advantage on Ability Checks with a chosen Ability. Enlarge - Reduce Enlarge - Size is increased. Weapon attacks deal 1d4 more damage. Has Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.Reduce - Size is reduced. Weapon attacks deal 1d4 less damage. Has Disadvantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.
